text: Inham kitaba vali'am nala yudha karom jihare na ta alaha upara bharosa rakhade hana na praloka de dina upara ate na alaha ate usa de rasula upara. Alaha ate usa de rasula valom harama kite ho'e nu jihare harama nahim manade hana ate na sace dharama nu apana dharama bana'unde hana. Ithom taka ki uha apane hatham nala (jazi'a) dena ate adhina rahina
